name: Parsing error found when parsing the template
description: Checks for JSON/YAML formatting errors in your template

name: Error found when transforming the template
description: Errors found when performing transformation on the template

name: Error processing rule on the template
description: Errors found when processing a rule on the template

name: Basic CloudFormation Template Configuration
description: Making sure the basic CloudFormation template components are properly configured

name: Template size limit
description: Check the size of the template is less than the upper limit

name: Template description limit
description: Check if the size of the template description is less than the upper limit

name: Template description can only be a string
description: Template description can only be a string

name: GetAtt validation of parameters
description: Validates that GetAtt parameters are to valid resources and properties of those resources

name: FindInMap validation of configuration
description: Making sure the function is a list of appropriate config

name: Check if Refs exist
description: Making sure the refs exist

name: GetAz validation of parameters
description: Making sure the function not is of list

name: ImportValue validation of parameters
description: Making sure the function not is of list

name: Select validation of parameters
description: Making sure the function not is of list

name: Split validation of parameters
description: Making sure the split function is properly configured

name: Sub validation of parameters
description: Making sure the sub function is properly configured

name: Ref validation of value
description: Making the Ref has a value of String (no other functions are supported)

name: Base64 validation of parameters
description: Making sure the function not is of list

name: Join validation of parameters
description: Making sure the join function is properly configured

name: Validation NOT function configuration
description: Making sure that NOT functions are list

name: Cidr validation of parameters
description: Making sure the function CIDR is a list with valid values

name: Cannot reference resources in the Conditions block of the template
description: Check that any Refs in the Conditions block uses no resources

name: Check dynamic references secure strings are in supported locations
description: Dynamic References Secure Strings are only supported for a small set of resource properties.  Validate that they are being used in the correct location when checking values and Fn::Sub in resource properties. Currently doesn't check outputs, maps, conditions, parameters, and descriptions.

name: Check Fn::If structure for validity
description: Check Fn::If to make sure its valid.  Condition has to be a string.

name: Sub is required if a variable is used in a string
description: If a substitution variable exists in a string but isn't wrapped with the Fn::Sub function the deployment will fail.

name: Parameters have appropriate properties
description: Making sure the parameters are properly configured

name: Parameters have appropriate type
description: Making sure the parameters have a correct type

name: Parameters have appropriate names
description: Check if Parameters are properly named (A-Za-z0-9)

name: Parameter limit not exceeded
description: Check the number of Parameters in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Parameter name limit not exceeded
description: Check the size of Parameter names in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Parameter value limit not exceeded
description: Check if the size of Parameter values in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Default value cannot use Refs
description: Check if Refs are not used in Parameter Defaults

name: Default value is within parameter constraints
description: Making sure the parameters have a default value inside AllowedValues, MinValue, MaxValue, AllowedPattern

name: Resource ELB Properties
description: See if Elb Resource Properties are set correctly HTTPS has certificate HTTP has no certificate

name: Check Ec2 Ebs Properties
description: See if Ec2 Ebs Properties are valid

name: Resource EC2 Security Group Ingress Properties
description: See if EC2 Security Group Ingress Properties are set correctly. Check that "SourceSecurityGroupId" or "SourceSecurityGroupName" are  are exclusive and using the type of Ref or GetAtt

name: Check if IAM Policies are properly configured
description: See if there elements inside an IAM policy are correct

name: Check Properties that are mutually exclusive
description: Making sure CloudFormation properties that are exclusive are not defined

name: Check Properties that are required together
description: Make sure CloudFormation resource properties are included together when required

name: Check Properties that need at least one of a list of properties
description: Making sure CloudFormation properties that require at least one property from a list. More than one can be included.

name: Check Properties that need only one of a list of properties
description: Making sure CloudFormation properties that require only one property from a list. One has to be specified.

name: Check for SubscriptionFilters have beyond 2 attachments to a CloudWatch Log Group
description: The current limit for a CloudWatch Log Group is they can have 2 subscription filters. We will look for duplicate LogGroupNames inside Subscription Filters and make sure they are within 2. This doesn't account for any other subscription filters getting set.

name: Check if EOL Lambda Function Runtimes are used
description: Check if an EOL Lambda Runtime is specified and give an error if used.

name: Check State Machine Definition for proper syntax
description: Check the State Machine String Definition to make sure its JSON. Validate basic syntax of the file to determine validity.

name: CodePipeline Stages
description: See if CodePipeline stages are set correctly

name: CodePipeline Stage Actions
description: See if CodePipeline stage actions are set correctly

name: Resource schema
description: CloudFormation Registry resource schema validation

name: Basic CloudFormation Resource Check
description: Making sure the basic CloudFormation resources are properly configured

name: Resource properties are valid
description: Making sure that resources properties are properly configured

name: Required Resource properties are missing
description: Making sure that Resources properties that are required exist

name: Resource dependencies are not circular
description: Check that Resources are not circularly dependent by DependsOn, Ref, Sub, or GetAtt

name: Check DependsOn values for Resources
description: Check that the DependsOn values are valid

name: Resources have appropriate names
description: Check if Resources are properly named (A-Za-z0-9)

name: Unique resource and parameter names
description: All resources and parameters must have unique names

name: Check values of properties for valid Refs and GetAtts
description: Checks resource properties for Ref and GetAtt values

name: Resource limit not exceeded
description: Check the number of Resources in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Resource name limit not exceeded
description: Check the size of Resource names in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Check resource properties values
description: Checks resource property values with Primitive Types for values that match those types.

name: CloudFront Aliases
description: CloudFront aliases should contain valid domain names

name: Check the configuration of a resources UpdatePolicy
description: Make sure a resources UpdatePolicy is properly configured

name: Property is required based on another properties value
description: When certain properties have a certain value it results in other properties being required. This rule will validate those required properties are specified when those values are supplied

name: Property is unwanted based on another properties value
description: When certain properties have a certain value it results in other properties not being needed. This rule will validate those unwanted properties are not specified when those values are supplied

name: Validate Route53 RecordSets
description: Check if all RecordSets are correctly configured

name: Check Events Rule Targets are less than or equal to 5
description: CloudWatch Events Rule can only support up to 5 targets

name: Resource SubnetRouteTableAssociation Properties
description: Validate there is only one SubnetRouteTableAssociation per subnet

name: RDS instance type is compatible with the RDS type
description: Check the RDS instance types are supported by the type of RDS engine. Only if the values are strings will this be checked.

name: Check Elastic Cache Redis Cluster settings
description: Evaluate Redis Cluster groups to make sure automatic failover is enabled when cluster mode is enabled

name: Validate AWS Event ScheduleExpression format
description: Validate the formation of the AWS::Event ScheduleExpression

name: Check if properties have a valid value
description: Check if properties have a valid value in case of an enumator

name: Check if property values adhere to a specific pattern
description: Check if properties have a valid value in case of a pattern (Regular Expression)

name: Check if a list has between min and max number of values specified
description: Check lists for the number of items in the list to validate they are between the minimum and maximum

name: Check if a string has between min and max number of values specified
description: Check strings for its length between the minimum and maximum

name: Check if a number is between min and max
description: Check numbers (integers and floats) for its value being between the minimum and maximum

name: Check DeletionPolicy values for Resources
description: Check that the DeletionPolicy values are valid

name: Check UpdateReplacePolicy values for Resources
description: Check that the UpdateReplacePolicy values are valid

name: Check if a list has duplicate values
description: Certain lists don't support duplicate items. Check when duplicates are provided but not supported.

name: Check if Serverless Resources have Serverless Transform
description: Check that a template with Serverless Resources also includes the Serverless Transform

name: AttributeDefinitions / KeySchemas mismatch
description: Verify the set of Attributes in AttributeDefinitions and KeySchemas match

name: RecordSet HostedZoneName is a superdomain of Name
description: In a RecordSet, the HostedZoneName must be a superdomain of the Name being validated

name: Check at least one essential container is specified
description: Check that every TaskDefinition specifies at least one essential container

name: Check if REFing to a IAM resource with path set
description: Some resources don't support looking up the IAM resource by name. This check validates when a REF is being used and the Path is not '/'

name: Check if a JSON Object is within size limits
description: Validate properties that are JSON values so that their length is within the limits

name: ValidationDomain is superdomain of DomainName
description: In ValidationDomainOptions, the ValidationDomain must be a superdomain of the DomainName being validated

name: Metadata Interface have appropriate properties
description: Metadata Interface properties are properly configured

name: Check that Modules resources are valid
description: Check that Modules resources are valid

name: Outputs have appropriate properties
description: Making sure the outputs are properly configured

name: Outputs have required properties
description: Making sure the outputs have required properties

name: Outputs have values of strings
description: Making sure the outputs have strings as values

name: Outputs have appropriate names
description: Check if Outputs are properly named (A-Za-z0-9)

name: Outputs descriptions can only be strings
description: Outputs descriptions can only be strings

name: Output limit not exceeded
description: Check the number of Outputs in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Output name limit not exceeded
description: Check the size of Output names in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Output description limit not exceeded
description: Check the size of Output description in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Mappings are appropriately configured
description: Check if Mappings are properly configured

name: Mappings have appropriate names
description: Check if Mappings are properly named (A-Za-z0-9)

name: Mapping keys are strings and alphanumeric
description: Check if Mappings keys are properly typed as strings and alphanumeric

name: Mapping limit not exceeded
description: Check the number of Mappings in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Mapping name limit not exceeded
description: Check the size of Mapping names in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Mapping attribute limit not exceeded
description: Check if the amount of Mapping attributes in the template is less than the upper limit

name: Conditions have appropriate properties
description: Check if Conditions are properly configured

name: Check if the referenced Conditions are defined
description: Making sure the used conditions are actually defined in the Conditions section

name: Check Fn::Equals structure for validity
description: Check Fn::Equals is a list of two elements

name: Check Fn::And structure for validity
description: Check Fn::And is a list of two elements

name: Check Fn::Not structure for validity
description: Check Fn::Not is a list of one element

name: Check Fn::Or structure for validity
description: Check Fn::Or is a list of two elements

name: Template size limit
description: Check the size of the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Template description limit
description: Check if the size of the template description is approaching the upper limit

name: Use Sub instead of Join
description: Prefer a sub instead of Join when using a join delimiter that is empty

name: Parameter limit
description: Check the number of Parameters in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Parameter name limit
description: Check the size of Parameter names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Parameter value limit
description: Check if the size of Parameter values in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Resource limit
description: Check the number of Resources in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Check stateful resources have a set UpdateReplacePolicy/DeletionPolicy
description: The default action when replacing/removing a resource is to delete it. This check requires you to explicitly set policies

name: Resource name limit
description: Check the size of Resource names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Check resources with auto expiring content have explicit retention period
description: The behaviour for data retention is different across AWS Services.If no retention period is specified the default for some services is to delete the data after a period of time.This check requires you to explicitly set the retention period for those resources to avoid unexpected data losses

name: Check if a list that allows duplicates has any duplicates
description: Certain lists support duplicate items.Provide an alert when list of strings or numbers have repeats.

name: ARNs should use correctly placed Pseudo Parameters
description: Checks Resources if ARNs use correctly placed Pseudo Parameters instead of hardcoded Partition, Region, and Account Number

name: Output limit
description: Check the number of Outputs in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Output name limit
description: Check the size of Output names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Output description limit
description: Check the size of Output description in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Mapping limit
description: Check the number of Mappings in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Mapping name limit
description: Check the size of Mapping names in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Mapping attribute limit
description: Check if the amount of Mapping attributes in the template is approaching the upper limit

name: Ref/GetAtt to resource that is available when conditions are applied
description: Check the Conditions that affect a Ref/GetAtt to make sure the resource being related to is available when there is a resource condition.

name: FindInMap keys exist in the map
description: Checks the keys in a FindInMap to make sure they exist. Check only if the Map Name is a string and if the key is a string.

name: Sub validation of parameters
description: Validate that Fn::Sub Parameters are used

name: Sub isn't needed if it doesn't have a variable defined
description: Checks sub strings to see if a variable is defined.

name: Check if Parameters are Used
description: Making sure the parameters defined are used

name: Check if parameters have a valid value
description: Check if parameters have a valid value in case of an enumator. The Parameter's allowed values is based on the usages in property (Ref)

name: Check if parameters have a valid value based on an allowed pattern
description: Check if parameters have a valid value in a pattern. The Parameter's allowed pattern is based on the usages in property (Ref)

name: Check if Password Properties are correctly configured
description: Password properties should not be strings and if parameter using NoEcho

name: Check if ImageId Parameters have the correct type
description: See if there are any refs for ImageId to a parameter of inappropriate type. Appropriate Types are [AWS::EC2::Image::Id, AWS::SSM::Parameter::Value<AWS::EC2::Image::Id>]

name: Parameter Memory Size attributes should have max and min
description: Check if a parameter that is used for Lambda memory size  should have a min and max size that matches Lambda constraints

name: Check IAM Resource Policies syntax
description: See if the elements inside an IAM Resource policy are configured correctly.

name: Check if EOL Lambda Function Runtimes are used
description: Check if an EOL Lambda Runtime is specified and give a warning if used.

name: Warn when properties are configured to only work with the package command
description: Some properties can be configured to only work with the CloudFormationpackage command. Warn when this is the case so user is aware.

name: Check obsolete DependsOn configuration for Resources
description: Check if DependsOn is specified if not needed. A Ref or a Fn::GetAtt already is an implicit dependency.

name: Availability Zone Parameters should not be hardcoded
description: Check if an Availability Zone property is hardcoded.

name: Check resources with UpdateReplacePolicy/DeletionPolicy have both
description: Both UpdateReplacePolicy and DeletionPolicy are needed to protect resources from deletion

name: Check IAM Permission configuration
description: Check for valid IAM Permissions

name: Metadata Interface parameters exist
description: Metadata Interface parameters actually exist

name: Check for NoEcho References
description: Check if there is a NoEcho enabled parameter referenced within a resources Metadata section

name: Check Outputs using ImportValue
description: Check if the Output value is set using ImportValue, so creating an Output of an Output

name: Check if Mappings are Used
description: Making sure the mappings defined are used

name: Check if Conditions are Used
description: Making sure the conditions defined are used

name: Cfn-lint Rule
description: This reporting may be triggered by a custom cfn-lint rule or by a default cfn-lint rule that has not yet been added to the Sonar IaC analyzer.
